\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Main\+Window. 

La finestra principal de l\textquotesingle{}aplicatiu, on podràs veure posts, comentar, iniciar sessió o modificar perfil i publicar. 

Definition at line \mbox{\hyperlink{_main_window_8g_8cs_source_l00043}{43}} of file \mbox{\hyperlink{_main_window_8g_8cs_source}{Main\+Window.\+g.\+cs}}.
